targets.rawSql: SELECT d.given_name || ' ' || d.family_name AS driver, a.avg_lap_ms FROM aggregations a JOIN drivers d ON a.driver_id = d.id ORDER BY a.avg_lap_ms ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT d.given_name || ' ' || d.family_name AS driver, a.fastest_lap_ms FROM aggregations a JOIN drivers d ON a.driver_id = d.id ORDER BY a.fastest_lap_ms ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT d.given_name || ' ' || d.family_name AS driver, a.pit_stops FROM aggregations a JOIN drivers d ON a.driver_id = d.id ORDER BY a.pit_stops DESC LIMIT 10;
